MAD1 Easy Add a Traveï»¿l Location Location Name : Pick a mode : Moderate Hard Submit Peacock Hill Gallery Add Delete Peacock Hill Map Add to Fav Gallery Camping Gear Book a Room Calculate Route Number of Days - One Accommodation - Local Restaurant Road Conditions - Vehicles with a good ground clearence can go (Alto, Vitz and 4WDs) Route - Colombo -> Pussellawa -> Para deka -> Doragala -> Monarakanda -> Doragala -> Kotmale Maha Seya (15Km) -> Ulapane -> Nawalapitiya -> Katabolawa -> Nawalapitiya -> Mapakanda -> Galboda -> Hatton ->Colombo Tips, Notes and Special remark Take Water Do not carry Plastic items (Minimize), Make sure you bring back everything you took
